ITEM.NAME: Melon Protector Head
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Caution: Seeds may get in your eyes. Adds ability to survive hitting 1 obstacle or enemy.

ITEM.NAME: Voodoo Protector Head
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: May cause player to prick phone with pins if upset by our game. Survive hitting 2 obstacles or enemies.

ITEM.NAME: Horse Head Pro
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: The latest in memefication technology, gives you instant cool status. Survive hitting 3 obstacles or enemies.

ITEM.NAME: Cone Pro Head
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Like a bad dog you’ll look funny in this.

ITEM.NAME: #1 Foam Finger
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Those who rule the stadiums rule the field of play. Survive hitting 5 obstacles or enemies.

ITEM.NAME: Piggy Bank Mode
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Unlike other get rich quick schemes, it’s not a scam. 2x extra coins collected.

ITEM.NAME: Carbon Fibre Piggy Mode
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Like a black sheep, but it’s a pig. Makes you stand out. 3x extra coins collected.

ITEM.NAME: Gold Piggy Mode
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Feed it a carrot, or 9 carats. Either way, it’ll fatten up your wallet. 4x extra coins collected.

ITEM.NAME: Diamond Piggy Mode
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Bling, bling, everytime I come up in yo city, with 5x extra coins? Rap can be positive.

ITEM.NAME: Vac Pac
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: If ya going to suck, be good at it. Vacuum body & nozzle arms suck up extra coins.

ITEM.NAME: Blac Vac Pac
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Carbon Fibre adds suckiness & you’ll be the toughest maid in an apron, anywhere. Plus get 2x extra time.

ITEM.NAME: Gold Vac Pac
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Your phone becomes a vacuum that picks up real gold dust. Not. You only get extra coins. Plus 3x extra time.

ITEM.NAME: Diamond Vac Pac
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Stolen from an evil oil baron, so don’t feel guilty. Adds extra coin suckage plus get 4x extra time.

ITEM.NAME: Sloth Slow Mode
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: For those with a predisposition for delayed laughs and slow reaction times. Hellllooo McFly???

ITEM.NAME: Carbon Fibre Sloth
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Slows everything down like an R. Kelly love song, only much less creepy. Plus 2x slo mo.

ITEM.NAME: Gold Sloth
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Enough time to answer your Mum’s calls, rather than pretending you didn’t hear. Also get 3x extra slo mo.

ITEM.NAME: Diamond Sloth
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Slows playing speed down so much, you can grab a cup of tea between obstacles. Plus adds 4x extra slo mo.

ITEM.NAME: Flitter Permitter
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Blink and you’ll miss it. Gives you a pin drop time of 1 second.

ITEM.NAME: Flash in the Pan
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Fall faster than Rebecca Black’s stardom. Increase your pin drop time by 2 seconds.

ITEM.NAME: Lead Balloon
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: For swifter exits, like when you tell an absolute howler. Increase your pin drop time by 3 seconds.

ITEM.NAME: Hail the hail
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: When you rain down on enemies, they call their insurance brokers. Increase your pin drop time by 4 seconds.

ITEM.NAME: Peregrine Swoop
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: The fastest animal in the world. Turns prey into hunter with one tap. Increases pin drop time by 5 seconds.

ITEM.NAME: Diaper Drop
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: You turn like a sumo. Just let yourself fall for goodness sake.

ITEM.NAME: ‘L’ plater
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Stolen off a boyracer, this upgrade’s inherited its previous owner’s steering skills. Next to none.

ITEM.NAME: Tiger Moth
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Actually, forget the tiger. You're basically a passenger on a moth heading nowhere, with limited steering skills.

ITEM.NAME: The Joey
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A sidestep that gets you out of almost any jam. Become a legendary playmaker.

ITEM.NAME: King Pin
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Like a mafia don, you’ll escape all the stickiest jams. Consider this a get out of jail card.

ITEM.NAME: Woah
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Slow down there speed racer. Increase drift time for 1 extra second..

ITEM.NAME: You're my boy blue
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: We miss him too. Increase drift time for 2 extra seconds.

ITEM.NAME: Blue Steel
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Time for that perfect selfie. Increase drift time for 3 extra seconds.

ITEM.NAME: Slowpoke Rodriguez
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: So slow oh no. Increase drift time for 4 extra seconds.

ITEM.NAME: FOMO
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: It’s like you’ll never miss out on anything ever again. Increase drift time for 5 extra seconds.

ITEM.NAME: The Lonely Nug
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: All on it’s little lonesome.

ITEM.NAME: Three of a Kind
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Sprinkles little clusters of 3 nugs in the Nug Zone.

ITEM.NAME: 6 Pack
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Piles of 6 Nugs everywhere.

ITEM.NAME: Strike
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: 10 Nugs! All in one go.

ITEM.NAME: Land of Plenty
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Get greedy or share, 20 Nugs at a time.

ITEM.NAME: The Nug Suit
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Eat in case of emergency. If only it were solid gold

ITEM.NAME: The Golden Nug
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: One of a kind and makes you soooo attractive, at least to Nugs if no one else.

ITEM.NAME: The Carl
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: He’s your average Joe only he’s Carl, and he’s heaps way above average. He da man, like He-man.

ITEM.NAME: The Fonz
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Click ya fingers & the opposite sex will flock. Boss jukeboxes & be the coolest cat on the planet. Almost

ITEM.NAME: The Rrrrrrrr
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: How to become a hipster? Dress like a pirate. Same beard, tattoos, clothes and a cool pet.

ITEM.NAME: The Neil
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Call Houston and tell them you have a problem. We take no responsibility for the crank call though.

ITEM.NAME: The Player
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Add je ne sais quoi to your wardrobe. In the real world though, your vinyl shoes are still trying too hard.

ITEM.NAME: The Invisible Suit
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: For ultra-hardcore players who are so ultra-hardcore that they can play without even seeing ultra-hardcore Carl.

ITEM.NAME: The Daniel San
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Wax on..... wWax off...... Master your k-chop..... Win state karate finals. Done.

ITEM.NAME: The Head Honcho
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: An essential outfit for any ruler. Put the "onions in a bag" and lead from the front.

ITEM.NAME: The Steak Suit
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Put this thing on and you’ll be sizzling hotter than a bitumen road during summer.

ITEM.NAME: The Ho-ho-ho!
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Ever wondered how Santa flies to all those houses? ~This suit will help you find out.
